gear.model: GemiBook Pro when on the go

software.name: Visual Studio Code
software.about: Prefer to use this for coding as I like minimalism, the ease of switching themes and adding extensions

software.name: Windows Terminal with PowerShell 7
software.about: Slapping this with Oh My Posh and we can get a more useful terminal and better looking. Also have created my own color scheme for terminal, I could not find a light theme terminal color scheme anywhere!

software.name: Chrome
software.about: Great for debugging, styling and also Lighthouse for performance and SEO

software.name: Google Meet
software.about: I use this for meetings as most people have access to it and google calendar works great

software.name: Notion
software.about: For writing a list of software tasks in the day or to-dos in the office or just write down how to solve problems this is great, works good even on the free version

software.name: Light Theme everywhere
software.about: I think i'm not alone on this one but we sure are rare I am a developer that uses only light mode
